external_references.source_name: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024
external_references.description: CSIRT CTI. (2024, January 23). Stately Taurus Targets Myanmar Amidst Concerns over Military Junta’s Handling of Rebel Attacks. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has been initiated using LNK files that were programmed to display a PDF icon to entice the victim to click on the file to execute an office.exe binary.(Citation: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024)
